Room.Name: The Northern Dump
Room.ShortDescription: This is the disposal pits for the village of Brownhaven.
Room.LongDescription: Constant fires burn here twenty four hours a day, every day. Not only does the garbage of the village get burned, but since there is such a limited amount of space in the cemetery, many of the poor who die also wind up here, thrown on some garbage pile waiting to be torched. Rats and some larger animal you cannot quite identify seem to be running in all directions, looking for food.
